name: My Fear
description:
Atmospheric game in an impossible forest. Can you fix your car and get out alive?

This is horror/adventure game that is on "imposible" map. Go long enough in one direction and you'll end up in the place where you started.

You need to fix your car and leave the forrest, but unknown entity is making things hard for you.

This game was made for Brackeys GameJam 2022.1. I used ton of Unity assets store assets so check the credits in the game.

Controls: WSAD,Lshift,Space,F
